item.title: Justin Baldoni's Pac-Man Movie Faces Trouble In Light Of It Ends With Us Legal Drama
item.description: The future of Justin Baldoni's planned Pac-Man movie is in trouble due to the ongoing It Ends With Us legal drama with former co-star Blake Lively.

item.title: "The First F—kin' Scene We Shot Together": Anthony Mackie Recalls Forgetting His Line In Front Of Harrison Ford While Filming Captain America: Brave New World
item.description: Anthony Mackie recently opened up about the positive experience of working with Harrison Ford on the set of Captain America: Brave New World.

item.title: Dune: Part Three - Confirmation & Everything We Know
item.description: After the explosive ending of Dune 2, Dune 3 could cap off Denis Villeneuve’s Dune trilogy by focusing on the events of the novel Dune: Messiah.
